name: 2021 7th International Conference on Communication and Information Processing
content: PUBLICATION: ICCIP 2021 is to publish latest & high-quality research works on communication and information processing in theoretical and practical aspects. The ISBN number assigned to ICCIP 2021 is 978-1-4503-8519-0\. Submitted paper will be peer reviewed by conference committees. The accepted paper will be included into ICCIP 2021 Conference Proceedings, which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus
